idea:
Beyond Enough

An Interactive Lifestyle Experiences Platform.

Dedicated to work with innovative, unique and premium brands under the portfolio of Online Shopping; Travel, Entertainment, Beauty and Recharges. On every product purchased or services availed, consumers get over & above the expectations - Beyond Cash. Our patrons expect best service, quality & experience.


Primary Brand - BEYOND ENOUGH


Brand Extensions:

• Entertainment (Beyond Tickets): Amusement Parks | Events & Activities | Movie Ticketing | Dining Program

• Shopping (Beyond Mall): A marketplace for quirky, innovative, impulse buy products

• Travel (Beyond Travel): Cruises | Flights | Buses | Cabs – local/rentals/outstation | Hotel – Domestic/International Packages

• Beauty (Beyond Salon): our inhouse Luxury Doorstep Salon Services

• Redemptions (Beyond Redeem): Brand Gift Cards Sales | Partner Brand Vouchers | Partner Brand Packages

• (Beyond Special): upcoming innovation in customized package creation

• Recharges & Bill payments

• (Beyond Cash): inhouse closed wallet


We thrive to provide a premium experience to our patrons.


Partners with us – Imagicaa (Theme + Water+ Snow + Novotel Stay) | Smaaash | Kidzania | Wet‘n Joy | Magic Mountain | Essel World | Water Kingdom | Ramoji Film City | Madame Tussauds | Gujarat Tourism | Rann Utsav | Statue of Unity | The Great Escape | Shangrila | Jalesh Cruises | BEYOND SALON (our in-house doorstep Salon brand) | PayPal | Mobikwik | HDFC Bank

idea: GSharp Media Pvt. Ltd (herein after reffered as Hoopr) is a company that creates media-tech products and content brands. Hoopr – India’s first music licensing platform with thousands of Indian songs, themes, snapsongs and sound effects that any video creator, broadcaster or business can license and use legally in their videos. Hoopr aims to become India’s and Asia’s largest platform with thousands of high-quality songs across multiple Indian and Asian languages. Hoopr's categories of music include Songs (Content Creators & Broadcasters), Snapsongs, Themes and Jingles, Mnemonics and Themes. We aim to have a music library of over 10000 exclusive royalty free tracks, SFX and Video for India and Asia over the next 4 years. With AI enabled music search and Chat Music Assistant, we want to make the process of finding the right track a fun, enriching and inspiring experience for the content creator.The Hoopr platform solves three important problems of local content (music across multiple Indian and Asian languages, formats, duration and use cases), cost effectiveness (subscription based) and most importantly clearances (royalty free, cleared perpetually for digital media and broadcast, depending upon license purchased). It also provides hundreds of music creators an opportunity to put out their music for use in videos worldwide.
name: GSHARP MEDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
VISION TECHNOCRAFT PVT LTD is a Private incorporated on 21 February 2014. It is classified as Non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Mumbai by a young, fast-growing organization whose ambition is to reach the forefront of technology through relentless efforts and responding dynamically to demands from the electronic security market specially. It was established by a team of young budding professionals committed to trust, integrity and pursuit of excellence and is rapidly becoming the leader in electronic security market.

Company has developed and now offers, advanced electronic security solutions, especially society segment. Company has more focus on after sales service rather than selling a product. Company is believing long term healthy relation with clients with latest technology which is helpful for smooth and secured life.

With a commitment that is focused on enhancing productivity, comfort and safety for everyone through continuous learning and investment in technology, VISION has carved itself the niche as dynamic security solutions provider, delivering cutting edge security solutions, equipment’s and services.

In order to live up to our commitment, we prioritize keeping pace with and constantly upgrading to latest security technologies. This translates into greater product effectively and solutions, leading to peace of mind for our consumers. This makes us the first choice as one-stop-shop for all your security equipment needs, as also one of India's largest suppliers of premium quality security products for homes, housing societies, the banking industry, and all public and commercial facilities and institutions.

We believe security solution are essential business systems, uniquely positioned to deliver value that goes beyond traditional security thinking.
name: VISION TECHNOCRAFT PVT LTD
